Desde su lanzamiento en 2016, Dead by Daylight prometía ser un Survival-coop digno de su categoría; hoy, dos años después, haciendose de una amplia gama de personajes y asesinos, el equipo de Behaviour Digital Inc. en conjunto con Starbreeze nos ofrece una de las mejores experiencias en el mundo del Survival Horror. 
Si bien, Dead By Daylight no está exento de lag, bugs, errores de conexión, haters, etc. eso no impide que al momento de jugar, te veas inmerso en una atmosfera de terror, desesperación, tensión y desesperanza. La cual atrapa todos tus sentidos para así, perseguido por tu asesino favorito (Myers, Leatherface, Freddy, etc.) te mantengas con vida hasta escapar.

Just remember... Death is not an escape.

Fun game, until you cant drop pallets bc of poor connection, or you magically get downed without anything happening and the killer hooks you in a split second. Fun game idea, stupid bugs, and coding. Fix your fuckin game instead of creating new killers that aren't neccessary until the game is decent.

Ein gut gemachtes Game, dass sich in seiner Kategorie weit von der Konkurrenz abgrenzt. (Naja, aktuell existiert in dieser Form nicht mal Konkurrenz...) Viele wählbaren Überlebende, sowie Killer. Schöne Maps und auch genügend Möglichkeiten seinen erwählten Charakter zu gestalten. Wenn man was im Shop kauft, ist es auch nur Optisch, man hat keinerlei Vorteile - Perfekt!

Anmerkung: Man muss sich bewusst sein, dass man in DBD überwiegend auf eine aggressive, beleidigende, rassistische und sozial ärmere Community trifft. Also legt euch ein dickes Fell an - schlechte Verlierer, sowie schlechte Gewinner in fast jedem Match.

Anmerkung 2: Dead by Daylight wird als Horrorgame ausgeschrieben, ist es aber nur von der Mechanik her und vielleicht nur in den ersten Runden bis man die Funktionen verstanden hat. Denn die Rolle des Killers ist so weit geschwächt worden, dass man rasch erkennt, dass Überlebende keinen Respekt vor der Rolle des Killers haben.

Und auch wenn ich sehr Gespalten bin, ob ich das Spiel wirklich empfehlen würde, sage ich dennoch: JA. Warum? Wie oben genannt: Es gibt in dieser Form keine wirkliche Konkurrenz. Und das Spiel ist vom Grundstock sehr gut.

Comment dire, les premières minutes sont sympa, l'ambiance visuelle et sonore est excellente, flippante, angoissante. Mais malheureusement après plusieurs heures de jeu on se rend compte que la communauté est majoritairement toxiques,e fairplay on oubli. On réalise aussi rapidement qu'ils se sont trompés dans le titre de leur jeu. "Dead bugs Daylight" ou "Bugs by Daylight" serait plus appropriés. De plus les développeurs favorisent et encouragent les joueurs mauvais qui campent, focus alors que c'est ce qui tue le jeu, c'est à se demander si il y en a d'ailleurs des développeurs. Ils devraient déjà commencer par essayer corriger leurs bugs, et apprendre a équilibrer leur jeu mais apparemment ils n'ont pas cette expérience et on d'autres priorités plus lucratives, comme par exemple sortir des skins hors de prix toutes les semaines, des extensions payantes tout les 3 mois et comme s'ils n'en avaient pas encore assez ils ajoutent des pass saisonniers. Et après on en vient au cross-plateform pour palier aux manques de payeurs euh pardon de joueurs mais ça, ça ne dure qu'un temps. Quand il n'y aura plus de vaches à lait à traire ... ils sortiront le numéro 2. Pathétique ...
Ein scheiß spiel (Pay to Win) Kauft es euch auf keinen fall!!!!!

Dead by Daylight is literally my favorite game, I have been playing it for 4 years now and to say the least it's amazing. Running around with friends to try and survive a nasty trial where the killer knows his way around has always been my go to when bored or just wanting a break. However in the new update I am no longer able to chat with surviors before or after the game has finished and I think this is a real problem. I can't even tell people to bring party streamers if they have them which is very frustrating or gg at the end. I can type in the chat box just can't hit enter so that everyone can see it. Alas this is my reason behing this review I just don't know how else to reach the producers of the game.. Pallets also have a slower response time but I understand this is due to pallet looping and ya'lls way of fixing that. So I won't complain about that however I will about the animation for throwing down a pallet which by the way was wonderful. This praticular subject is now very disastifing and turns me away from the game completely, because of course, that was my favorite part of the game. On the other hand I would like to thank ya'll for not ruining decisive strike like you planned to. However in the new update with the new clothes, meg is the new frat boy, but Nea is the new female Willy Wonka. Yes, I said it: Willy Wonka, have yall seen the one with Johnny Depp? Those round sunglasses. Nea is the surviours killer, and you made her willy wonka. What happened to the emo surviour killer? Now she's just some random hipster and it's very depressing. Alas if you want the willy wonka hipster I will deal with it. Thanks for your time, please fix my favorite game.

First: 
There are bugs, there are exploits, awful community, and there is really bad gameplay balance between survivors and killers

But:
I will recommend the game to anyone looking for a satisfying pvp experience. Skill is a great factor in this game, and you will always feel rewarded when you have spent time and effort to master a killer or to improve your surviving skills. The pleasure of capturing your victim, or the thrill of a succesful escape will be your fuel throught every match.

The core gameplay is unique and dynamic: 4 survivors vs 1 killer where both race against time. The killer will play and feel powerful hunting down survivors. Survivors will feel the threat and fear while trying to escape and hide. Simple and well executed. Like I said, the balance will feel against you more often than not, but the devs are working to solve many problems, and keep the game updated in a regular basis.

Either to play alone or with friends i always come back to Dead by Daylight.

My friend showed me this game and we played it every time I came over. So my birthday passed and I bought a Steam card and bought this game. I got on and it wouldn't load. Only one time I actually got on a server with it loading and it wouldn't let me move. The game only works on certain devices. Her game let her play, but my computer doesn't have anything else downloaded on it but hers does so she has a better chance of getting a virus and my computer doesn't have a virus. My internet is so fast but not on this game. So today I tried to play and it had to update for an hour. I waited about an hour and a half and it let me on but I clicked to be a survivor and it said I couldn't play. It said, "EAC has detected that game files have been modified (error code 4). To resolve this, please verify the integrity of the game cache (found under the Local Files section of the game's properties). Additional info: Unknown file version (DeadByDaylight\Content\Paks\pakchunk38-windowsnoeditor.pak)/. How am I supposed to do that. That makes absolute no sense to me. When it says that it makes me quit the game. If someone can help me please do. Or I just wasted 20 dollars on this game.

dead by daylight è sicuramente uno di quei giochi che ha stravolto il genere horror,portandolo in modo decisamente piu' arcade,all'inizio si avrà tensione e paura da survivor,ma col tempo diventerà un gioco dove a far paura saranno i survivor dato che,piu' in avanti si imparerà a jukkare il killer,addirittura facendoli smattare,l'unico gioco in qui è il killer ad aver paura.
a sfavore abbiamo le lobby con host che spesso sono causa di exploit da parte del killer per far laggare i survivor,
alcuni killer sono sbilanciati e molti perk sono praticamente inutile.
spezzo una lancia a favore di quest'ultima meccanica che permette di perkare il proprio survivor a piacimento(sono abilità)
detto cio' consiglio a chi piace l'horror e anche a chi piace tryhardare,perchè ci vorranno almeno 50 ore per padroneggiare al meglio il gioco e essere decenti

Veo que la mayoría de comentarios negativos que he leído son críticas hacia la comunidad:
- Jugadores tóxicos: pues como en todos los juegos
- Asesinos que campean: pues son asesinos, algunos campean y otros no. Es lo que hay, "deal with it".
- Supervivientes que no cooperan: lo mismo que los puntos anteriores, es lo que hay.
- Los supervivientes/asesinos están OP: aprende a jugar.
...

Personalmente no llevo mucho tiempo jugando, pero la idea del juego y la originalidad me ha parecido genial.
Gráficamente es brutal, la ambientación está perfectamente conseguida y auditivamente da gusto jugar con auriculares.
Está claro que el juego no es perfecto, tiene bastantes bugs, aunque la mayoría se producen cuando el host tiene una conexión de mierda y pegan lagazos, en vez de utilizar un servidor dedicado,

En lo referente a la comunidad, hay de todo, como en todos los juegos. 
Cuando más juegas más buenas/malas experiencias tienes, cuanto más ayudas a tus compañeros, más se apoyan unos a otros en la partida (habitualmente). Es decir, no esperes dejar morir a alguien y que después otro te salve a ti. Igual que no esperes que todos los asesinos "te dejen liberar" facilmente, algunos campearán más y otros campearán menos, personalmente no lo veo mal, algo que parece que la comunidad de no entiende. El trabajo del asesino es matar a los supervivientes, no dejarlos escapar.
En definitiva, y generalizando, el pensamiento de la "comunidad asesina" es: "Los supervivientes son OP, no pueden matarse, y solo campean los generadores y a los colgados y te ciegan con la linterna"; mientras que el pensamiento de la "comunidad superviviente" es: "Los asesinos solo campean a los colgados y son todos unos noobs porque me han matado". Vamos, que aquí como siempre todo el mundo quiere ganar.

Y no nos olvidemos que es un juego que cuesta 20€, 10€ si está rebajado.
Nada mal por lo que llega a ofrecer.
